author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Mohawk Industries Says CEO Jeffrey Lorberbaum's Total Compensation Was $5.02 Mln V/s $7.07 Mln In 2016
text:
April 6 (Reuters) - Mohawk Industries Inc:
* MOHAWK INDUSTRIES INC SAYS CEO JEFFREY S. LORBERBAUM'S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $5.02 MILLION VERSUS $7.07 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2JoDaOk ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
